#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
bool graph[105][105];
bool visited[105];
int matchR[105];
int n;
bool bpm(int u){
   for(int v=0;v<n;v++) if(graph[u][v])
   {
      if(visited[v])
        continue;
      visited[v]=true;
      if(matchR[v]<0 || bpm(matchR[v])){
	 matchR[v]=u;
	 return true;
      }
   }
   return false;
}
int main(){
   int q;
   scanf("%d",&n);
   memset(matchR,-1,sizeof(matchR));
   scanf("%d",&q);
   while(q--){
      int x,y;
      scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
      graph[x-1][y-1]=true;
   }
   int cnt=0;
   for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
      memset(visited,0,sizeof visited);
      if(bpm(i))
        cnt++;
   }
   printf("%d\n",cnt);
   return 0;
}
